{{also|Sechs}} ==Central Franconian== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|gmw-cfr|sähs||westernmost Ripuarian}} ===Etymology=== From {{bor|gmw-cfr|de|sechs}}, from {{der|gmw-cfr|goh|sehs}}, from {{der|gmw-cfr|gem-pro|*sehs}}, from {{der|gmw-cfr|ine-pro|*swéḱs}}. The now marginal variant ''sähs'' is the native form, since Old High German ''-hs-'' regularly develops into {{IPAchar|[s]}} (see {{m|gmw-cfr|Lahs}}, {{m|gmw-cfr|Ohs}}, {{m|gmw-cfr|wahße}}). Compare also {{m|gmw-cfr|fönnef||five}} and {{m|gmw-cfr|sibbe||seven}}, which are non-native forms, too. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|gmw-cfr|/zɛks/}} ===Numeral=== {{head|gmw-cfr|numeral}} # {{lb|gmw-cfr|most dialects}} [[six]] ---- ==German== {{cardinalbox|de|5|6|7|fünf|sieben|ord=sechste}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|}}, from {{inh|de|goh|sehs}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*sehs}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*swéḱs}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/zɛks/}} * {{audio|de|De-sechs.ogg|audio}} * {{homophones|de|Sex}} {{i|according to a now rare pronunciation}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral|cat2=cardinal numbers}} # [[six]] {{gloss|numerical value represented by the Arabic numeral 6; or ''describing a set with six elements''}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|sechste}} * {{l|de|sechzehn}} * {{l|de|sechzig}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Hunsrik== {{cardinalbox|hrx|5|6|7|finnef|sieve|ord=sechst}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/seks/}} ===Numeral=== {{head|hrx|numeral|cat2=cardinal numbers}} # [[six]] #: {{ux|hrx|Sie hon '''sechs''' Kinner.|They have '''six''' children.}} #: {{ux|hrx|Jetz is-es '''sechs''' Uher.|Now it's '''six''' o'clock.}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Luxembourgish== {{cardinalbox|lb|5|6|7|fënnef|siwen|ord=sechst}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|lb|goh|sehs}}, from {{inh|lb|gem-pro|*sehs}}, from {{inh|lb|ine-pro|*swéḱs}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/zæks/}} * {{audio|lb|lb-sechs.ogg|Audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|lb|numeral|cat2=cardinal numbers}} # [[six]] ---- ==Pennsylvania German== {{cardinalbox|pdc|5|6|7|fimf|siwwe|ord=sechst}} ===Numeral=== {{head|pdc|numeral|cat2=cardinal numbers}} # [[six]]
